title: New: Constance – Lilac
body:
Stumbled across this absolutely beautiful track from Montreal’s **Constance** (Guillaume Guilbault), which forms part of his debut EP, simply titled _One_.

Merging sweeping string sections, with a diverse selection of ambient sounds, all settling delicately on top of his Youth Lagoon-esque vocal line, it’s a stunning listen. Check it out below, and hear the full EP [here](https://soundcloud.com/constanceisconstance/sets/one).
